actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to authorize the establishment of the Fort Miffin Nation Historic Site in the State of Pennsylvania, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to establish the Fort Miffin National Historic Site in the State of Pennsylvania. Authorizes appropriations of sums necessary to achieve such purpose.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the establishment of the Fort Miffin Nation Historic Site in the State of Pennsylvania, and for other purposes.
